title: Avigilon Enhances Partner Loyalty Program with a New Way to Earn
text:
Avigilon Plus Champions Program will reward eligible individuals for their loyalty

VANCOUVER, Canada — Avigilon Corporation (“Avigilon”), a Motorola Solutions company, today announced the upcoming launch of its new rewards program, Avigilon Plus Champions.

For the first time ever, Avigilon will enable Partners’ customer facing employees to earn 1% back in rewards for every Avigilon order placed.* The Avigilon Plus Champions Program, available in Canada and the United States, will incentivize eligible individuals involved in the sale of certain Avigilon products with easy to redeem rewards.

“We believe that the continued success of Avigilon is a direct result of the relationships we have built with our Partners and their employees,” said Ryan Nolan, senior vice president of Commercial Operations at Avigilon. “We are proud to be a company that manufactures high quality products and technologies in North America** with North American expertise and globally sourced materials. We designed this program to reward our Canadian and American Partners for helping their customers protect what matters most with trusted security solutions from Avigilon.”

Registration for the Avigilon Plus Champions Program is now open. For questions about the Avigilon Plus Champions Program, email partner.program@avigilon.com.

*Eligibility for and the granting of rewards are subject to both Avigilon Corporation’s “Incentive Rewards Programs – General Terms and Conditions” and the “Official Rules” for the Avigilon Plus Champions Incentive Rewards Program.

**With manufacturing facilities in both the United States and Canada, our “made in North America” claim only applies to products from our Plano, Texas and Richmond, BC facilities.

About Avigilon

Avigilon, a Motorola Solutions company, designs, develops and manufactures solutions in video analytics, cloud, security cameras, video management software and hardware, and access control. Avigilon is an industry leader and, together with Motorola Solutions, provides integrated solutions for video security, access control and critical communications. To learn more about Avigilon, visit avigilon.com.
